attributes.action: lower income tax, from the now standard 22% down to a more  15%
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Once income tax has been deducted from your earnings, so too on average of 3% goes to N.I contributions if you earn below the 40% taxable threshold.
That is a total of 25% give or take. And you may think to yourself its only 25%, well consider this, thats 3 months of your year gone on tax.
